title: Roborock Q Series robot vacuums take on seasonal allergies with LiDAR, Auto Empty Dock Pure, more (save up to 23%)
content:
Regularly cleaning the floors in your home is the best way to deal with seasonal allergies, but frustrating vacuum maintenance can slow you down. Roborock has your back with its new and Q5+ robot vacuum cleaners. With auto-empty compatibility, multi-level mapping, and smart app control, Roborock Q5+ can deliver up to seven weeks of hands-free cleaning at an affordable price.

more…
